summary: A man entranced by his dreams and imagination is love-struck with a French woman and feels he can show her his world.
cast: Gael García Bernal|Charlotte Gainsbourg|Alain Chabat|Miou-Miou|Pierre Vaneck|Emma de Caunes|Aurélia Petit|Sacha Bourdo|Stéphane Metzger|Alain de Moyencourt|Inigo Lezzi|Yvette Petit|Jean-Michel Bernard|Eric Mariotto|Bertrand Delpierre
title: La ciencia del sueño
